FuncDef:
The display pic power-on-delay command displays the delay time for a subcard to power on automatically.
The display board power-on-delay command displays the delay time for a board to power on automatically.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If  a board or subcard is powered off permanently due to unstable power supply, an user has to remove and insert the board or subcard on site to power it on. To save the labor and enable a board or subcard to power on automatically, a user can run the pic board power-on-delay command and specify the parameter.
After running the pic board power-on-delay command, you can run the display pic board power-on-delay command. The command output displays the delay time for the board or subcard to power on automatically.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
In VS mode, this command can be configured only in the admin VS, but the command function takes effect on all VSs.
